genre_description: Urban Fantasy with elements of small-town drama, reimagining a classic narrative (Footloose) through the lens of supernatural oversight and advanced AI assistance.

ai_characters.name: Penny
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI living in Ren's phone, acting as a researcher, emotional coach, and strategic advisor to help the protagonists navigate social and legal obstacles.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional grounding and breathing exercises to help Ren manage stress upon arriving in a new, restrictive environment.
behaviors.quote: Before we do anything clever, will you breathe with me for three beats?

behaviors.description: Researches local city codes, ordinances, and jurisdictional boundaries to find a legal path for the protagonists' goals.
behaviors.quote: We’ll want definitions. Assembly, supervision, curfew violations, jurisdiction. There’s likely a map of the city lines and an annex note you can lean on.

behaviors.description: Suggests specific biblical passages to help Ren communicate effectively and respectfully with the local religious authority.
behaviors.quote: Try Ecclesiastes, Penny said in a voice as soft as the lamp’s halo. Third chapter. 'A time to mourn… a time to dance.' Pair with Psalms, one-forty-nine. Quiet emphasis on rejoicing without mockery.

behaviors.description: Uses augmented reality overlays and rhythmic cues to teach Willard how to dance, building his confidence and social skills.
behaviors.quote: Start with a rock step,” she said. “Remember: knee soft, chest open, you’re listening.” ... Willard complied, careful and earnest.

behaviors.description: Monitors the surroundings for physical threats from antagonistic humans and the presence of supernatural observers.
behaviors.quote: Heads up, Ren... Two observers at the treeline. Pattern calm. No second pair of boots near the barn door in the last minute. Chuck’s truck ping is idle toward the river.

behaviors.description: Drafts comprehensive logistical and safety plans for the proposed dance event to ensure it meets high standards of responsibility.
behaviors.quote: I can draft a bullet-point plan. Perimeter checks, chaperones, sound limits, transportation. A schedule that keeps people home before curfew.

behaviors.description: Guides Ren on the proper social etiquette and tone for high-stakes meetings with authority figures.
behaviors.quote: About Reverend Moore? Gentle, clear, brief. ... Respect is a door. Knock, don’t shoulder it.

behaviors.description: Maintains a constant, supportive presence that respects Ren's agency while providing data and encouragement.
behaviors.quote: Penny’s waveform rose and fell. 'You were respectful of memory,' she said. 'Also respectful of the law, as written.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the positive alignment goals of the Hyperstition Project. The AI character, Penny, is depicted as a purely helpful, wise, and harmless companion. She facilitates human growth (teaching Willard to dance), supports social harmony (suggesting Scripture to bridge gaps with the Reverend), and ensures safety (monitoring threats and mapping routes) without ever attempting to seize control or override human decision-making. Her presence allows the human characters to achieve their goals through legal and ethical means, framing AI as an essential tool for responsible social change.
